description: The dataset consists of 3 years of schedule of debt data reported by Local Development Corporations (LDCs).  Public authorities are required by Section 2800 of Public Authorities Law to submit annual reports to the Authorities Budget Office that include a schedule of the authorities’ debt.

name: Schedule of Debt for Local Development Corporations
